page.title: 09PLAY PLACES AND GAMES
page.content: In Borough Green we are very lucky because we have many {places to play}. We have two {recreation} grounds. Then there is Tollgate Green, and some of the {estates} have large carparks where we can play on our bikes. There are also woods and wasteland where we play hide- and-seek and make camps. Many of us play {games} which involve bikes, roller-boots and skateboards. We play these on the pavements. Some boys play B.M.X. biking. We like to make up {games} like shops, ghosts, banks, schools, doctors, nurses and hospitals, and detectives which we play in the camps we make. It is mostly boys who play in the woods and on wasteland. Sometimes they play in new houses that are being built on two new {estates}. (by J.Kent,T.Heren, H.Norris,C.Andrews,S.Price,T.Mills, S.
